'''Strange Key''' is a [[Quest Item]] found in the southern part of [[Mt. Mingyuan]]. It is used to unlock a wooden cage with a [[Carefree Simulacrum]] trapped inside.

It is obtained from an [[investigation]] point after defeating {{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Handyman|text=Who Am I? &mdash; Rock Drops Keep Falling on My Head}}.
